portfolio.name: ComparMed.com - First Romanian Pharma Medication Search Engine
portfolio.details: I've created the first Romanian Pharma search engine that empowers customers to save money and time medication.

personal.about_me:
: I am a man passionate about technology, I love new things, I love
experimenting with new technologies, researching on topics of interest. I am a
persistent man who doesn't give up until exhausting all options. I have coding,
technical and communication skills, but I am also a great seller. I have the
ability to speak using non-technical language to explain technical terms to nontechnical people. I have hobbies too, I enjoy biking, snowboarding and I LOVE
listening to music.

responsibilities: Developing and maintaining an eCommerce Platform in Python Django
Developing and maintaining frontend in Django, Javascript
Processing XML, JSON and XLSX files in Python
accomplishments:
In one weekend I've developed a Robotic Process Automation (RPA) software in Python that can be
used by employees without software developing experience (from the Implementation Department)
to integrate the Contentspeed Platform with ERP software that we don't have direction integration
(i.e. Navision, Trendix, SAP). This software has an easy to use interface in Microsoft Excel that
employees can use to easily recreate the steps taken by a human to enter orders in the ERP software and export stocks and prices to be imported in the Contentspeed Platform.This software has halved
the implementation time of a RPA Integration.

I've developed DOWNIMG.GA a website that greatly eases the work of my colleagues in the
implementation department by allowing them to quickly batch download images using an excel
import file and that file will be ready to import products into our Contentspeed eCommerce
Platform. It also allows them to split Excel Files and match keys and values to rows and columns,
greatly reducing their time processing excel files. For this project I've used Python, Django, Celery,
Redis, Docker on the backednd and Javascript, HTML, Bootstrap on the frontend.

I've developed my own eCommerce platform www.radergy.ro using Python Django Rest Framework
and NextJS (a Reactive JS framework)

I've developed in MicroServ Filewatcher - https://github.com/allexradu/MicroServFileWatcher - It
allows to automatically replicate common code changes across micro services.

I've developed a blog using Asynchronous Event Driven Micro Services Architecture - https://
github.com/allexradu/NodeJS_Microservices_Blog

education.details:
Math and Computer Science Faculty from "Spiru Haret" University is fully accredited by the Romanian
Ministry of Education.

languages.details: Levels: A1 and A2: Basic user; B1 and B2: Independent user; C1 and C2: Proficient user

organization: Strong sales, negotiation and presentation skills both written and verbal
Team player, independent operator and highly proactive
Good strategic vision, ability to turn complex strategies into practical and execution oriented plans
Strong quantitative/analytical skills and ability to effectively manage data
communication: good negotiation, communication and problem solving skills
the ability to take on stress
explaining technical terms using non-technical speech
the ability to listen and to make myself heard in high-stress situations
